item.title: 7 Books to Read for Latine Heritage Month and Read Harder
item.description: Celebrate Latine Heritage Month by picking up these books by Latine authors that check off 2025 Read Hard Challenge tasks!

item.title: You’re Heard of the “One Bed” Trope, Now Meet “One Grant” in This Rival Wizards Romantasy
item.description: Two rival wizards, one grant, and one lab space. This delightful grumpy/sunshine romantasy is equal parts steamy and hilarious.

item.title: The Best Sci-Fi Graphic Novels of All Time
item.description: From the depths of space to very Earthly stories, these eight are the best sci-fi graphic novels of all time.

item.title: 12 Hobbit-Themed Goods for Hobbit Day
item.description: You may not have time for a village-wide fête with wizard fireworks, but you can still celebrate Hobbit Day with these Hobbit-themed goods.

item.title: The Best Cozy Mysteries To Read This Fall
item.description: If you like your reading to have some seasonal flair, here are three cozy mysteries to read this fall, each with a different autumn vibe.
